63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sahl:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) came to us while we were digging the trench and carrying out the earth on our backs. Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) then said, "O Allah ! There is no life except the life of the Hereafter, so please forgive the Emigrants and the Ansar

chapter.ara-name: باب دُعَاءُ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم أَصْلِحِ الأَنْصَارَ وَالْمُهَاجِرَةَ
chapter.eng-name: “O Allah! Improve and make right the state of the Ansar and the Muhajirun
